sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO dms_tb_order ( TRADE_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_FILE_PATH, SKU_ID, PROPERTIES_NAME, PRICE, `CHANGE`, QUANTITY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) (SELECT #tradeId#, t.item_id, t.item_name, k.file_path, #skuId#, q.properties_name, CASE WHEN q.price IS NULL THEN t.price ELSE q.price END, 0, #quantity#, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# FROM oms.dms_vw_goods t
LEFT JOIN( SELECT qq.item_id, qq.properties_name, qq.price FROM sup.sup_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state = 'U' AND qq.sku_id = #skuId#) q ON t.item_id = q.item_id
LEFT JOIN( SELECT kkk.item_id, max(kk.file_path) AS file_path FROM sup.sup_tb_file kk, sup.sup_tb_item_file kkk WHERE kk.file_id= kkk.file_id AND kk.state = 'U' AND kkk.state = 'U' AND kk.sup_id = #supId# GROUP BY kkk.item_id ) k ON t.item_id = k.item_id
WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.sup_id = #supId# AND t.item_id = #itemId# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO dms_tb_order ( TRADE_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_FILE_PATH, SKU_ID, PROPERTIES_NAME, PRICE, `CHANGE`, QUANTITY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) (SELECT #tradeId#, t.item_id, p.item_name, k.file_path, t.sku_id, q.properties_name, CASE WHEN q.price IS NULL THEN p.price ELSE q.price END, 0, t.quantity, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# FROM dms_tb_cart t
LEFT JOIN oms.dms_vw_goods p ON t.item_id = p.item_id
LEFT JOIN( SELECT qq.item_id, qq.sku_id, qq.properties_name, qq.price FROM sup.sup_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state = 'U') q ON t.sku_id = q.sku_id
LEFT JOIN( SELECT kkk.item_id, max(kk.file_path) AS file_path FROM sup.sup_tb_file kk, sup.sup_tb_item_file kkk WHERE kk.file_id= kkk.file_id AND kk.state = 'U' AND kkk.state = 'U' AND kk.sup_id = #supId# GROUP BY kkk.item_id ) k ON t.item_id = k.item_id
WHERE t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.sup_id = #supId# AND t.cart_id IN
#codes[]#
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.item_file_path AS itemFilePath, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.change, t.item_id AS itemId, t.sku_id AS skuId, CASE WHEN q.stock IS NULL THEN p.stock ELSE q.stock END AS stock FROM dms_tb_order t LEFT JOIN oms.dms_vw_goods p ON t.item_id = p.item_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT qq.sku_id, qq.stock FROM sup.sup_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state= 'U') q ON t.sku_id = q.sku_id WHERE p.item_id is not null AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND t.trade_id = #tradeId#

SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.item_file_path AS itemFilePath, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.change FROM dms_tb_order t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.trade_id = #tradeId# AND t.order_id = #orderId#
